```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(tidybayes)
library(gtsummary)
```

```{r}
#| label: data_load
#| message: false

#filter out stocks

x <- read_csv("q1_2024_all.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |>
   mutate(volatility_rank = 
            case_when(volatility_rank %in% c(1,4) ~ "low",
    volatility_rank %in% c(5,7) ~ "mid" ,
    volatility_rank %in% c(8,10) ~ "high"))|>
  select(security, ticker, volatility_rank, hidden, date) |>
  filter(hidden > 0) |>
  drop_na()
